name: I Born In The Shadows
description: I Born in the Shadows is a 2d platform game in which you help Laney solve the puzzles and must defend her self-consciousness from childhood trauma. Lenay, a 15-year-old girl with depression, receives a soul-healing session while playing an arcade game at the hospital. The arcade game is modeled on her memories and you play as the code to change and save "Lenay". It is a group work designed by Zhixuan Yang and Ruipeng Zhuang.
